ui.js

Summary
ui.js
TabbarSingleton for managing the tabbar of the browser.
Functions
getVisibleTabCountReturns the number of tabs that are currently visible
getAllTabsReturns an array of all tabs which exist in the current window tabbrowser.
showOnlyTheseTabsHides all of the tabs in the tab bar which are not passed into this function.
showAllTabsShows all of the tabs in the tab bar.
PageSingleton top-level UI manager.
Functions
setActiveTabSets the currently active tab.
getActiveTabReturns the currently active tab as a TabItem
UIClassSingleton top-level UI manager.
Variables
navBarA reference to the <Navbar>, for manipulating the browser’s nav bar.
tabBarA reference to the Tabbar, for manipulating the browser’s tab bar.
devModeIf true (set by an url parameter), adds extra features to the screen.
currentTabKeeps track of which <Tabs> tab we are currently on.
Functions
initMust be called after the object is created.
_secondaryInitThis is the bulk of the initialization, kicked off automatically by init once the system is ready.
_delayInitCalled automatically by _secondaryInit once sessionstore is online.

Tabbar

Singleton for managing the tabbar of the browser.

Summary
Functions
getVisibleTabCountReturns the number of tabs that are currently visible
getAllTabsReturns an array of all tabs which exist in the current window tabbrowser.
showOnlyTheseTabsHides all of the tabs in the tab bar which are not passed into this function.
showAllTabsShows all of the tabs in the tab bar.

Functions

getVisibleTabCount

getVisibleTabCount: function()

Returns the number of tabs that are currently visible

getAllTabs

getAllTabs: function()

Returns an array of all tabs which exist in the current window tabbrowser.  Returns an Array.

showOnlyTheseTabs

showOnlyTheseTabs: function(tabs,
options)

Hides all of the tabs in the tab bar which are not passed into this function.

Paramaters

  • An array of <BrowserTab> objects.
  • Some options

showAllTabs

showAllTabs: function()

Shows all of the tabs in the tab bar.

Page

Singleton top-level UI manager.  TODO: Integrate with UIClass.

Summary
Functions
setActiveTabSets the currently active tab.
getActiveTabReturns the currently active tab as a TabItem

Functions

setActiveTab

setActiveTab: function(tab)

Sets the currently active tab.  The idea of a focused tab is useful for keyboard navigation and returning to the last zoomed-in tab.  Hitting return/esc brings you to the focused tab, and using the arrow keys lets you navigate between open tabs.

Parameters

  • Takes a TabItem

getActiveTab

getActiveTab: function()

Returns the currently active tab as a TabItem

UIClass

Singleton top-level UI manager.  TODO: Integrate with Page.

Summary
Variables
navBarA reference to the <Navbar>, for manipulating the browser’s nav bar.
tabBarA reference to the Tabbar, for manipulating the browser’s tab bar.
devModeIf true (set by an url parameter), adds extra features to the screen.
currentTabKeeps track of which <Tabs> tab we are currently on.
Functions
initMust be called after the object is created.
_secondaryInitThis is the bulk of the initialization, kicked off automatically by init once the system is ready.
_delayInitCalled automatically by _secondaryInit once sessionstore is online.

Variables

navBar

this.navBar

A reference to the <Navbar>, for manipulating the browser’s nav bar.

tabBar

this.tabBar

A reference to the Tabbar, for manipulating the browser’s tab bar.

devMode

this.devMode

If true (set by an url parameter), adds extra features to the screen.  TODO: Integrate with the dev menu

currentTab

this.currentTab

Keeps track of which <Tabs> tab we are currently on.  Used to facilitate zooming down from a previous tab.

Functions

init

init: function()

Must be called after the object is created.

_secondaryInit

_secondaryInit: function()

This is the bulk of the initialization, kicked off automatically by init once the system is ready.

_delayInit

_delayInit : function()

Called automatically by _secondaryInit once sessionstore is online.
